short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any web page using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE: It also works on YouTube now, where it will summarize the video transcript.

AI Summarizer shows you the key points of any webpage with a single click. Text content
visible on a page is typically shortened 50-80% of the original content and shown
as a list of bullet points, making it easy and fast to scan.

Perfect for students, researchers, and anyone looking to save time, AI Summarizer helps 
you understand key points without reading through every word.

AI Summarizer is optimized for English. It can often understand other languages, but will
show the summary in English.

How it works

1. Install the extension by clicking the blue "Add to Chrome" button on this page
2. A new page will open with instructions
3. Whenever you want to get the bullet point summary of a page, just click the "S" icon in your browser's toolbar

One some popular websites like The New York Times, The Atlantic, Wired, and The New Yorker, this extension will also show a "Summarize" button below the story's headline.
